events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position successfully.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department as a software developer role.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this candidate.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate, who showed strong technical knowledge and enthusiasm.
The candidate responded promptly to schedule the technical interview, expressing keen interest in the role.
Technical interview with the candidate has been scheduled for April 25th at 15:00 UTC.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills.
HR interview has been arranged for the candidate on April 28th in the afternoon to discuss cultural fit.
The HR interview went well; the candidate aligned with company values and showed strong communication skills.
An official job offer was sent to the candidate including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
Candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed availability to start onboarding next month.
Onboarding process has commenced with the candidate beginning orientation and initial training sessions.
The hiring process is now complete and the candidate has been fully integrated into the engineering team.
